title: Number of Crunchyroll subscribers 2012 to 2018
summary: The statistic shows information on the Number of users PlayerUnknown 's Battlegrounds ( Crunchyroll ) on 2018 Crunchyroll from September_2012 to November_2018 .
According to the estimates , the battle royale game developed by Bluehole attracted 2000 thousands users on 2018 in November_2018 .
At the same time , the game had a global player base of 10 thousands .
gold: As of November 2018 , the anime-focused subscription video-on-demand platform Crunchyroll had around two million paying subscribers.
Subscription numbers have grown rapidly in recent years , with the company managing to double its number of paying subscribers between February 2017 and November 2018.

What is Crunchyroll ? Similar to services like Netflix and Hulu , Crunchyroll provides subscribers with on-demand access to shows and video media through either monthly subscriptions or cheaper , ad-supported programming .
